CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE "UPLOAD_MULTISCAN_P" 
AS 
  CURSOR c_data IS 
    SELECT * FROM CNL_SYS.multiscan_data_load 
    WHERE NVL(status, 'NULL') != 'OK'; 
  p_ok NUMBER; 
  p_message VARCHAR2(1000); 
BEGIN 
  FOR r_data IN c_data LOOP 
    cnl_multiscan_pck.proc_data_p(
      r_data.USERS, r_data.client_id, r_data.SKU_ID, r_data.NBR_TRCK_LVLS, r_data.pallet_type, 
      r_data.track_level_1, r_data.each_depth, r_data.each_width, r_data.each_height, r_data.each_weight, 
      r_data.track_level_2, r_data.ratio_1_to_2, r_data.depth_2, r_data.width_2, r_data.height_2, r_data.weight_2, 
      r_data.track_level_3, r_data.ratio_2_to_3, r_data.depth_3, r_data.width_3, r_data.height_3, r_data.weight_3, 
      r_data.track_level_4, r_data.ratio_3_to_4, r_data.depth_4, r_data.width_4, r_data.height_4, r_data.weight_4, 
      r_data.track_level_5, r_data.ratio_4_to_5, r_data.depth_5, r_data.width_5, r_data.height_5, r_data.weight_5, 
      r_data.track_level_6, r_data.ratio_5_to_6, r_data.depth_6, r_data.width_6, r_data.height_6, r_data.weight_6, 
      r_data.track_level_7, r_data.ratio_6_to_7, r_data.depth_7, r_data.width_7, r_data.height_7, r_data.weight_7, 
      r_data.track_level_8, r_data.ratio_7_to_8, r_data.depth_8, r_data.width_8, r_data.height_8, r_data.weight_8, 
      r_data.layer_height, r_data.each_per_layer, r_data.num_layers, 
      p_ok, p_message); 
    UPDATE multiscan_data_load 
    SET status = CASE WHEN p_ok = 1 THEN 'OK' WHEN p_ok = 0 THEN 'Not OK' END, 
        response_message = p_message 
    WHERE sku_id = r_data.SKU_ID; 
  END LOOP; 
EXCEPTION 
  WHEN OTHERS THEN 
    NULL; 
END;

insert into fmm_maintenance_fee_payee select * from vw_fmm_maintenance_fee_payee0 where trunc(updated_dtm_loc) = trunc(sysdate); commit; delete from fmm_maintenance_fee_payee f where (NVL(F.ORDER_NO, 'AAA'),F.VESSEL_CODE) in (select apply_no,vessel_code from VW_FMM_MAINTENANCE_NO_PAYALL); delete from FMM_MAINTENANCE_INVOICE_DEL where fee_invoice_id in (select fee_invoice_id from VW_FMM_MAINTENANCE_INVOICE_DE0 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate)); insert into FMM_MAINTENANCE_INVOICE_DEL select * from VW_FMM_MAINTENANCE_INVOICE_DE0 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate); commit; delete from fmm_maintenance_invoice_rpt where fee_invoice_id in (select fee_invoice_id from vw_fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp0 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate)); insert into fmm_maintenance_invoice_rpt select * from vw_fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp0 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate); commit; delete from fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp5 where fee_invoice_id in (select fee_invoice_id from vw_fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp6 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate)); insert into fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp5 select * from vw_fmm_maintenance_invoice_rp6 where trunc(update_time) = trunc(sysdate); commit; DELETE FROM FMM_MAINTENANCE_ESTI_INV; INSERT INTO FMM_MAINTENANCE_ESTI_INV SELECT * FROM VW_FMM_MAINTENANCE_ESTI_INV VW; commit; BEGIN FOR CUR_BFM IN (select pi.business_id,pv.process_variable_id,pv.process_instance_id,pv.variable_value,case cc.IS_SHIP_ACTUAL_AFFIRM when '10' then '部分签收已完成' when '11' then '全部签收已完成' else '未签收' end as SHIP_ACTUAL_AFFIRM from wfl_process_variable pv left join wfl_process_instance pi on pi.process_instance_id = pv.process_instance_id left join bfm_purchase_order cc on cc.po_number=pi.business_id where pv.variable_name = 'display' and pi.business_id in (select t.po_number from bfm_purchase_order t where t.oil_type='002' and t.order_status in ('7','8') and t.created_dtm_loc > TO_DATE ('2018-01-01', 'YYYY-mm-dd'))) LOOP update wfl_process_variable tt set tt.variable_value = case when instr(tt.variable_value,'_',1) =0 then tt.variable_value else substr(tt.variable_value,1,instr(tt.variable_value,'_',1)-1) end where tt.process_variable_id=CUR_BFM.process_variable_id; commit; update wfl_process_variable tt set tt.variable_value = tt.variable_value || '_' || CUR_BFM.SHIP_ACTUAL_AFFIRM where tt.process_variable_id=CUR_BFM.process_variable_id; commit; END LOOP; END; P_LOG_EXCEPTION(SQLCODE || SQLERRM || 'insert 结束时间:' || sysdate, 'SP_FEE_MAINTENANCE_DAILY_JOB'); COMMIT; END IF; END SP_FEE_MAINTENANCE_DAILY_JOB; $$"}

(FD.INVOICE_TYPE = V_INVOICE_TYPE OR V_INVOICE_TYPE IS NULL) AND (FD.INVOICE_CODE = V_INVOICE_CODE OR V_INVOICE_CODE IS NULL) AND (FD.INVOICE_NO = V_INVOICE_NO OR V_INVOICE_NO IS NULL) AND (FD.DTL_PROJECT_CODE = V_DTLPROJECT OR V_DTLPROJECT IS NULL)) T2 ON T.ORGAN_FEE_HEADER_ID=T2.ORGAN_FEE_HEADER_ID LEFT JOIN (SELECT wi.BUSINESS_ID,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '开始', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 开始,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '提交', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 提交,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '总经理', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 总经理,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '党委书记', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 党委书记,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '部门负责人', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 部门负责人,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '主管高管', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 主管高管,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '副总经理（主持工作）', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 副总经理主持工作,MAX(DECODE(wi.NODE_NAME, '财务经办人', wi.USR_NAME, '')) AS 财务经办人 FROM VW_WFL_PROCESS_INSTANCE wi WHERE wi.NODE_NAME NOT LIKE '%node-%' AND wi.BUSINESS_ID IN (SELECT fh.organ_fee_header_id FROM fc_organ_fee_header fh WHERE (FH.COST_CONTROL_COMPANY IN (SELECT COLUMN_VALUE FROM LS_CURSOR2) OR V_COST_CONTROL_COMPANY IS NULL) AND (FH.CHARGE_DEPT = V_CHARGE_DEPT OR V_CHARGE_DEPT IS NULL) AND (FH.PROJECT_CODE = V_FEE_TYPE OR V_FEE_TYPE IS NULL) AND (FH.APPLY_USER = V_APPLY_USER OR V_APPLY_USER IS NULL) AND (FH.HOST_PERSON = V_HOST_PERSON OR V_HOST_PERSON IS NULL) AND (FH.CLAIM_NO = V_CLAIM_NO OR V_CLAIM_NO IS NULL) AND (FH.CLAIM_DATE >= TO_DATE(V_CLAIM_DATE_F, 'YYYY-MM-DD') OR V_CLAIM_DATE_F IS NULL) AND (FH.CLAIM_DATE <= TO_DATE(V_CLAIM_DATE_T, 'YYYY-MM-DD') OR V_CLAIM_DATE_T IS NULL) AND (FH.SUBMIT_IND = V_SUBMIT_IND OR V_SUBMIT_IND IS NULL) AND (FH.AUDIT_PROGRESS IN (SELECT COLUMN_VALUE FROM LS_CURSOR) OR V_AUDIT_PROGRESS IS NULL)) GROUP BY wi.BUSINESS_ID) T3 ON T3.BUSINESS_ID=T2.ORGAN_FEE_HEADER_ID; END SP_OFFSET_INFORMATION_V2;

CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE AO_FMS_AUTINV_CONTRAST_STATINV (S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO IN VARCHAR2, V_INVOICE_NUM IN VARCHAR2, V_INVOICE_CODE IN VARCHAR2, V_DEDU_PERIOD IN VARCHAR2, V_OPERATOR IN VARCHAR2, V_DEDU_DATE_FROM IN VARCHAR2, V_DEDU_DATE_TO IN VARCHAR2, V_PURCHASER_NAME IN VARCHAR2, OUTCURSOR OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) IS
BEGIN
  OPEN OUTCURSOR FOR
  SELECT FAI.authed_invoice_id AS CONTRAST_ID,
         FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_AUT,
         FAI.PURCHASER_NAME AS PURCHASER_NAME_AUT,
         FAI.INVOICE_CODE AS INVOICE_CODE_AUT,
         FAI.BILLING_DATE AS BILLING_DATE_AUT,
         FAI.INVOICE_NUM AS INVOICE_NUM_AUT,
         FAI.AMOUNT_TAX AS AMOUNT_TAX_AUT,
         FAI.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_AUT,
         '' AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_STAT,
         '' AS PURCHASER_NAME_STAT,
         '' AS INVOICE_CODE_STAT,
         NULL AS BILLING_DATE_STAT,
         '' AS INVOICE_NUM_STAT,
         NULL AS AMOUNT_TAX_STAT,
         NULL AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_STAT,
         '1' AS DIFFERENCE_CAUSE,
         FAI.DEDU_PERIOD AS DEDU_PERIOD_AUT,
         '' AS DEDU_PERIOD_STAT,
         SU.USR_NAME AS OPERATOR_AUT,
         '' AS OPERATOR_STAT,
         FAI.DEDU_DATE AS DEDU_DATE_AUT,
         NULL AS DEDU_DATE_STAT
  FROM FMM_AUTHED_INVOICE FAI
  LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON FAI.UPDATED_BY_USER = SU.USR_CODE AND FAI.COMPANY_CODE = SU.COMPANY_CODE
  WHERE 1=1
    AND (S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO IS NULL OR FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO)
    AND (V_INVOICE_NUM IS NULL OR FAI.INVOICE_NUM = V_INVOICE_NUM)
    AND (V_INVOICE_CODE IS NULL OR FAI.INVOICE_CODE = V_INVOICE_CODE)
    AND (V_DEDU_PERIOD IS NULL OR FAI.DEDU_PERIOD = V_DEDU_PERIOD)
    AND (V_OPERATOR IS NULL OR SU.USR_NAME = V_OPERATOR)
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_FROM IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FAI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') >= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_FROM,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_TO IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FAI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_TO,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_PURCHASER_NAME IS NULL OR FAI.PURCHASER_NAME = V_PURCHASER_NAME)
    AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
      FROM FMM_AUTHED_STAT_INV FASI
      WHERE FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO
        AND FASI.INVOICE_NUM = FAI.INVOICE_NUM
        AND FASI.INVOICE_CODE = FAI.INVOICE_CODE
    )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT FASI.authed_stat_inv_id AS CONTRAST_ID,
         '' AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_AUT,
         '' AS PURCHASER_NAME_AUT,
         '' AS INVOICE_CODE_AUT,
         NULL AS BILLING_DATE_AUT,
         '' AS INVOICE_NUM_AUT,
         NULL AS AMOUNT_TAX_AUT,
         NULL AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_AUT,
         FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_STAT,
         FASI.PURCHASER_NAME AS PURCHASER_NAME_STAT,
         FASI.INVOICE_CODE AS INVOICE_CODE_STAT,
         FASI.BILLING_DATE AS BILLING_DATE_STAT,
         FASI.INVOICE_NUM AS INVOICE_NUM_STAT,
         FASI.Total_Taxt AS AMOUNT_TAX_STAT,
         FASI.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_STAT,
         '2' AS DIFFERENCE_CAUSE,
         '' AS DEDU_PERIOD_AUT,
         FASI.DEDU_PERIOD AS DEDU_PERIOD_STAT,
         '' AS OPERATOR_AUT,
         FASI.OPERATOR_ACCOUNT AS OPERATOR_STAT,
         NULL AS DEDU_DATE_AUT,
         FASI.DEDU_DATE AS DEDU_DATE_STAT
  FROM FMM_AUTHED_STAT_INV FASI
  WHERE 1=1
    AND (S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO IS NULL OR FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO)
    AND (V_INVOICE_NUM IS NULL OR FASI.INVOICE_NUM = V_INVOICE_NUM)
    AND (V_INVOICE_CODE IS NULL OR FASI.INVOICE_CODE = V_INVOICE_CODE)
    AND (V_DEDU_PERIOD IS NULL OR FASI.DEDU_PERIOD = V_DEDU_PERIOD)
    AND (V_OPERATOR IS NULL OR FASI.OPERATOR_ACCOUNT = V_OPERATOR)
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_FROM IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FASI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') >= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_FROM,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_TO IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FASI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_TO,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_PURCHASER_NAME IS NULL OR FASI.PURCHASER_NAME = V_PURCHASER_NAME)
    AND NOT EXISTS (
      SELECT 1
      FROM FMM_AUTHED_INVOICE FAI
      WHERE FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO
        AND FAI.INVOICE_NUM = FASI.INVOICE_NUM
        AND FAI.INVOICE_CODE = FASI.INVOICE_CODE
    )
  UNION ALL
  SELECT FASI.authed_stat_inv_id AS CONTRAST_ID,
         FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_AUT,
         FAI.PURCHASER_NAME AS PURCHASER_NAME_AUT,
         FAI.INVOICE_CODE AS INVOICE_CODE_AUT,
         FAI.BILLING_DATE AS BILLING_DATE_AUT,
         FAI.INVOICE_NUM AS INVOICE_NUM_AUT,
         FAI.AMOUNT_TAX AS AMOUNT_TAX_AUT,
         FAI.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_AUT,
         FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO AS PURCHASER_TAX_NO_STAT,
         FASI.PURCHASER_NAME AS PURCHASER_NAME_STAT,
         FASI.INVOICE_CODE AS INVOICE_CODE_STAT,
         FASI.BILLING_DATE AS BILLING_DATE_STAT,
         FASI.INVOICE_NUM AS INVOICE_NUM_STAT,
         FASI.Total_Taxt AS AMOUNT_TAX_STAT,
         FASI.TOTAL_AMOUNT AS TOTAL_AMOUNT_STAT,
         '3' AS DIFFERENCE_CAUSE,
         FAI.DEDU_PERIOD AS DEDU_PERIOD_AUT,
         FASI.DEDU_PERIOD AS DEDU_PERIOD_STAT,
         SU.USR_NAME AS OPERATOR_AUT,
         FASI.OPERATOR_ACCOUNT AS OPERATOR_STAT,
         FAI.DEDU_DATE AS DEDU_DATE_AUT,
         FASI.DEDU_DATE AS DEDU_DATE_STAT
  FROM FMM_AUTHED_STAT_INV FASI
  INNER JOIN FMM_AUTHED_INVOICE FAI
    ON FAI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO
   AND FAI.INVOICE_NUM = FASI.INVOICE_NUM
   AND FAI.INVOICE_CODE = FASI.INVOICE_CODE
  LEFT JOIN Sys_User su
    ON FAI.UPDATED_BY_USER = SU.USR_CODE
   AND FAI.COMPANY_CODE = SU.COMPANY_CODE
  WHERE 1=1
    AND (S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO IS NULL OR FASI.PURCHASER_TAX_NO = S_PURCHASER_TAX_NO)
    AND (V_INVOICE_NUM IS NULL OR FASI.INVOICE_NUM = V_INVOICE_NUM)
    AND (V_INVOICE_CODE IS NULL OR FASI.INVOICE_CODE = V_INVOICE_CODE)
    AND (V_DEDU_PERIOD IS NULL OR FASI.DEDU_PERIOD = V_DEDU_PERIOD)
    AND (V_OPERATOR IS NULL OR FASI.OPERATOR_ACCOUNT = V_OPERATOR)
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_FROM IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FASI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') >= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_FROM,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_DEDU_DATE_TO IS NULL OR TO_DATE(SUBSTR(FASI.DEDU_DATE,1,10),'yyyy-MM-dd') <= TO_DATE(V_DEDU_DATE_TO,'yyyy-MM-dd'))
    AND (V_PURCHASER_NAME IS NULL OR FASI.PURCHASER_NAME = V_PURCHASER_NAME)
    AND (FASI.Total_Taxt <> FAI.Total_Taxt OR FASI.Total_Amount <> FAI.Total_Amount);
END AO_FMS_AUTINV_CONTRAST_STATINV;

case_datas.case_content: {"case_id": "5", "difficulty_level": "2", "source_dialect": "ORACLE", "target_dialect": "OceanBase的Oracle模式-4.2.5", "sql": "CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE SP_UPDATE_PRODUCT_PRICING(p_category_id IN NUMBER DEFAULT NULL, p_price_adjustment_pct IN NUMBER, p_min_price IN NUMBER DEFAULT 0, p_max_price IN NUMBER DEFAULT 999999, p_effective_date IN DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE) AS CURSOR c_products IS SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, p.current_price, p.cost_price, p.category_id, c.category_name, c.price_margin_min, c.price_margin_max FROM products p INNER JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.active_flag = 'Y' AND (p.category_id = p_category_id OR p_category_id IS NULL) AND p.current_price BETWEEN p_min_price AND p_max_price ORDER BY p.category_id, p.product_id; TYPE t_price_update IS RECORD (product_id NUMBER, old_price NUMBER, new_price NUMBER, margin_pct NUMBER); TYPE t_price_updates IS TABLE OF t_price_update INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER; v_price_updates t_price_updates; v_new_price NUMBER; v_margin_pct NUMBER; v_update_count NUMBER := 0; v_skip_count NUMBER := 0; v_batch_id NUMBER; v_idx NUMBER := 1; BEGIN SELECT price_batch_seq.NEXTVAL INTO v_batch_id FROM dual; INSERT INTO price_update_batch (batch_id, update_date, adjustment_percentage, category_id, status) VALUES (v_batch_id, SYSDATE, p_price_adjustment_pct, p_category_id, 'PROCESSING'); FOR rec IN c_products LOOP v_new_price := ROUND(rec.current_price * (1 + p_price_adjustment_pct / 100), 2); v_margin_pct := ((v_new_price - rec.cost_price) / rec.cost_price) * 100; IF v_margin_pct < rec.price_margin_min OR v_margin_pct > rec.price_margin_max THEN INSERT INTO price_update_log (batch_id, product_id, old_price, proposed_price, status, reason, log_date) VALUES (v_batch_id, rec.product_id, rec.current_price, v_new_price, 'REJECTED', 'Margin constraint violation: ' || ROUND(v_margin_pct, 2) || '% (Required: ' || rec.price_margin_min || '-' || rec.price_margin_max || '%)', SYSDATE); v_skip_count := v_skip_count + 1; ELSE v_price_updates(v_idx).product_id := rec.product_id; v_price_updates(v_idx).old_price := rec.current_price; v_price_updates(v_idx).new_price := v_new_price; v_price_updates(v_idx).margin_pct := v_margin_pct; v_idx := v_idx + 1; IF v_idx > 100 THEN FORALL i IN 1..v_price_updates.COUNT UPDATE products SET current_price = v_price_updates(i).new_price, last_price_update = p_effective_date, price_update_batch_id = v_batch_id WHERE product_id = v_price_updates(i).product_id; FORALL i IN 1..v_price_updates.COUNT INSERT INTO price_history (product_id, old_price, new_price, change_date, change_percentage, batch_id, margin_percentage) VALUES (v_price_updates(i).product_id, v_price_updates(i).old_price, v_price_updates(i).new_price, p_effective_date, p_price_adjustment_pct, v_batch_id, v_price_updates(i).margin_pct); v_update_count := v_update_count + v_price_updates.COUNT; v_price_updates.DELETE; v_idx := 1; END IF; END IF; END LOOP; IF v_price_updates.COUNT > 0 THEN FORALL i IN 1..v_price_updates.COUNT UPDATE products SET current_price = v_price_updates(i).new_price, last_price_update = p_effective_date, price_update_batch_id = v_batch_id WHERE product_id = v_price_updates(i).product_id; FORALL i IN 1..v_price_updates.COUNT INSERT INTO price_history (product_id, old_price, new_price, change_date, change_percentage, batch_id, margin_percentage) VALUES (v_price_updates(i).product_id, v_price_updates(i).old_price, v_price_updates(i).new_price, p_effective_date, p_price_adjustment_pct, v_batch_id, v_price_updates(i).margin_pct); v_update_count := v_update_count + v_price_updates.COUNT; END IF; UPDATE price_update_batch SET status = 'COMPLETED', products_updated = v_update_count, products_skipped = v_skip_count, completion_date = SYSDATE WHERE batch_id = v_batch_id; COMMIT; DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('Price update completed. Batch ID: ' || v_batch_id); DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('Updated: ' || v_update_count || ' products, Skipped: ' || v_skip_count || ' products'); EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN ROLLBACK; UPDATE price_update_batch SET status = 'FAILED', error_message = SQLERRM, completion_date = SYSDATE WHERE batch_id = v_batch_id; COMMIT; RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20006, 'Price update failed: ' || SQLERRM); END SP_UPDATE_PRODUCT_PRICING;"}

case_datas.case_content: {"case_id": "7", "difficulty_level": "3", "source_dialect": "ORACLE", "target_dialect": "Postgresql-9.2", "sql": "CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE SP_BULK_UPDATE_INVENTORY(p_warehouse_id IN NUMBER, p_adjustment_type IN VARCHAR2, p_adjustment_date IN DATE DEFAULT SYSDATE) AS TYPE t_inventory_rec IS RECORD (product_id NUMBER, current_qty NUMBER, adjustment_qty NUMBER, new_qty NUMBER); TYPE t_inventory_tab IS TABLE OF t_inventory_rec INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER; v_inventory t_inventory_tab; v_batch_size CONSTANT NUMBER := 1000; v_total_processed NUMBER := 0; v_error_count NUMBER := 0; CURSOR c_inventory IS SELECT product_id, quantity_on_hand, CASE p_adjustment_type WHEN 'RECOUNT' THEN physical_count - quantity_on_hand WHEN 'DAMAGE' THEN -damaged_quantity WHEN 'RETURN' THEN returned_quantity ELSE 0 END AS adjustment_qty FROM inventory_staging WHERE warehouse_id = p_warehouse_id AND status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY product_id; BEGIN SAVEPOINT bulk_update_start; OPEN c_inventory; LOOP FETCH c_inventory BULK COLLECT INTO v_inventory LIMIT v_batch_size; EXIT WHEN v_inventory.COUNT = 0; FOR i IN 1..v_inventory.COUNT LOOP BEGIN MERGE INTO inventory inv USING (SELECT v_inventory(i).product_id AS product_id, p_warehouse_id AS warehouse_id, v_inventory(i).adjustment_qty AS adj_qty FROM dual) src ON (inv.product_id = src.product_id AND inv.warehouse_id = src.warehouse_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET inv.quantity_on_hand = inv.quantity_on_hand + src.adj_qty, inv.last_adjustment_date = p_adjustment_date, inv.last_adjustment_type = p_adjustment_type WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (product_id, warehouse_id, quantity_on_hand, last_adjustment_date, last_adjustment_type) VALUES (src.product_id, src.warehouse_id, GREATEST(0, src.adj_qty), p_adjustment_date, p_adjustment_type); INSERT INTO inventory_audit_log (product_id, warehouse_id, adjustment_date, adjustment_type, old_quantity, adjustment_quantity, new_quantity, created_by) VALUES (v_inventory(i).product_id, p_warehouse_id, p_adjustment_date, p_adjustment_type, v_inventory(i).current_qty, v_inventory(i).adjustment_qty, v_inventory(i).current_qty + v_inventory(i).adjustment_qty, USER); v_total_processed := v_total_processed + 1; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN v_error_count := v_error_count + 1; INSERT INTO error_log (error_date, error_message, product_id) VALUES (SYSDATE, 'Inventory update failed: ' || SQLERRM, v_inventory(i).product_id); END; END LOOP; END LOOP; CLOSE c_inventory; UPDATE inventory_staging SET status = 'PROCESSED', processed_date = SYSDATE WHERE warehouse_id = p_warehouse_id AND status = 'PENDING'; COMMIT; DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('Bulk inventory update completed. Processed: ' || v_total_processed || ', Errors: ' || v_error_count); EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN ROLLBACK TO bulk_update_start; RAISE_APPLICATION_ERROR(-20001, 'Bulk inventory update failed: ' || SQLERRM); END SP_BULK_UPDATE_INVENTORY;"}

INSERT INTO inventory_audit_log (product_id, warehouse_id, adjustment_date, adjustment_type, old_quantity, adjustment_quantity, new_quantity, created_by) VALUES (v_inventory(i).product_id, p_warehouse_id, p_adjustment_date, p_adjustment_type, v_inventory(i).current_qty, v_inventory(i).adjustment_qty, v_inventory(i).current_qty + v_inventory(i).adjustment_qty, USER); v_total_processed := v_total_processed + 1; EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN v_error_count := v_error_count + 1; INSERT INTO error_log (error_date, error_message, product_id) VALUES (SYSDATE, 'Inventory update failed: ' || SQLERRM, v_inventory(i).product_id); END; END LOOP; END LOOP; CLOSE c_inventory; UPDATE inventory_staging SET status = 'PROCESSED', processed_date = SYSDATE WHERE warehouse_id = p_warehouse_id AND status = 'PENDING'; COMMIT; DBMS_OUTPUT.PUT_LINE('Bulk inventory update completed. CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE SP_GenerateFinancialReport (PeriodStart TIMESTAMP, PeriodEnd TIMESTAMP, ReportType VARCHAR(50), DepartmentID INT DEFAULT NULL) AS
DECLARE
    ReportID INT;
    TotalRevenue DECIMAL(15,2) := 0;
    TotalExpenses DECIMAL(15,2) := 0;
    NetIncome DECIMAL(15,2) := 0;
    SQLStmt TEXT;
    Params TEXT;
    ErrorMessage TEXT;
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO FinancialReportHeader (ReportType, PeriodStart, PeriodEnd, DepartmentID, CreatedDate, Status)
    VALUES (ReportType, PeriodStart, PeriodEnd, DepartmentID, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'PROCESSING');

    ReportID := CURRVAL('financialreporthader_reportid_seq');

    IF ReportType = 'INCOME_STATEMENT' THEN
        WITH RevenueData AS (
            SELECT AccountID, AccountName, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount
            FROM GeneralLedger gl
            INNER JOIN ChartOfAccounts coa ON gl.AccountID = coa.AccountID
            WHERE gl.TransactionDate BETWEEN PeriodStart AND PeriodEnd
              AND coa.AccountType = 'REVENUE'
              AND (DepartmentID IS NULL OR gl.DepartmentID = DepartmentID)
            GROUP BY AccountID, AccountName
        ),
        ExpenseData AS (
            SELECT AccountID, AccountName, SUM(Amount) AS TotalAmount
            FROM GeneralLedger gl
            INNER JOIN ChartOfAccounts coa ON gl.AccountID = coa.AccountID
            WHERE gl.TransactionDate BETWEEN PeriodStart AND PeriodEnd
              AND coa.AccountType = 'EXPENSE'
              AND (DepartmentID IS NULL OR gl.DepartmentID = DepartmentID)
            GROUP BY AccountID, AccountName
        )
        INSERT INTO FinancialReportDetail (ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, AccountType, Amount)
        SELECT ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, 'REVENUE', TotalAmount FROM RevenueData
        UNION ALL
        SELECT ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, 'EXPENSE', TotalAmount FROM ExpenseData;

        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(Amount), 0) INTO TotalRevenue
        FROM FinancialReportDetail
        WHERE ReportID = ReportID AND AccountType = 'REVENUE';

        SELECT COALESCE(SUM(Amount), 0) INTO TotalExpenses
        FROM FinancialReportDetail
        WHERE ReportID = ReportID AND AccountType = 'EXPENSE';

        NetIncome := TotalRevenue - TotalExpenses;

    ELSIF ReportType = 'BALANCE_SHEET' THEN
        WITH AssetData AS (
            SELECT AccountID, AccountName,
                   SUM(CASE WHEN DebitCredit = 'D' THEN Amount ELSE -Amount END) AS Balance
            FROM GeneralLedger gl
            INNER JOIN ChartOfAccounts coa ON gl.AccountID = coa.AccountID
            WHERE gl.TransactionDate <= PeriodEnd
              AND coa.AccountType = 'ASSET'
              AND (DepartmentID IS NULL OR gl.DepartmentID = DepartmentID)
            GROUP BY AccountID, AccountName
        ),
        LiabilityData AS (
            SELECT AccountID, AccountName,
                   SUM(CASE WHEN DebitCredit = 'C' THEN Amount ELSE -Amount END) AS Balance
            FROM GeneralLedger gl
            INNER JOIN ChartOfAccounts coa ON gl.AccountID = coa.AccountID
            WHERE gl.TransactionDate <= PeriodEnd
              AND coa.AccountType = 'LIABILITY'
              AND (DepartmentID IS NULL OR gl.DepartmentID = DepartmentID)
            GROUP BY AccountID, AccountName
        )
        INSERT INTO FinancialReportDetail (ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, AccountType, Amount)
        SELECT ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, 'ASSET', Balance FROM AssetData WHERE Balance != 0
        UNION ALL
        SELECT ReportID, AccountID, AccountName, 'LIABILITY', Balance FROM LiabilityData WHERE Balance != 0;
    END IF;

    UPDATE FinancialReportHeader
    SET TotalRevenue = TotalRevenue,
        TotalExpenses = TotalExpenses,
        NetIncome = NetIncome,
        Status = 'COMPLETED',
        CompletedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    WHERE ReportID = ReportID;

    RAISE INFO 'Financial report generated successfully. Report ID: %', ReportID;

EXCEPTION
    WHEN OTHERS THEN
        GET STACKED DIAGNOSTICS ErrorMessage = MESSAGE_TEXT;
        UPDATE FinancialReportHeader
        SET Status = 'FAILED',
            ErrorMessage = ErrorMessage
        WHERE ReportID = ReportID;
        RAISE EXCEPTION 'Financial report generation failed: %', ErrorMessage;
END;

DEALLOCATE employee_cursor; UPDATE PayrollHeader SET TotalGrossPay = @TotalGross, TotalNetPay = @TotalNet, Status = 'COMPLETED', CompletedDate = GETDATE() WHERE PayrollID = @PayrollID; PRINT 'Payroll processing completed. CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE p_job_create_bond_info_all()
AS
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE tmp_bond_info_all_20010;
    INSERT INTO tmp_bond_info_all_20010(f_val, def_id, id)
    SELECT field_value, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, t2.ID
    FROM T_OBJECT_FIELD_DATA t1, T_PJ_Bond_Info t2
    WHERE t1.OBJECT_NO = 20010
      AND t1.FIELD_VALUE IS NOT NULL
      AND t1.parent_id = t2.APPLY_ID;

    TRUNCATE TABLE tmp_bond_info_all_20020;
    INSERT INTO tmp_bond_info_all_20020(f_val, def_id, id)
    SELECT field_value, FIELD_DEFINITION_ID, t2.id AS bondId
    FROM T_OBJECT_FIELD_DATA t1, T_PJ_Bond_Info t2
    WHERE t1.OBJECT_NO = 20020
      AND t1.FIELD_VALUE IS NOT NULL
      AND t1.PARENT_ID = t2.TEMP_BONDID;

    TRUNCATE TABLE t_pj_bond_info_all;
    INSERT INTO t_pj_bond_info_all(id, temp_bondid, apply_id)
    SELECT t1.ID, t1.TEMP_BONDID, t1.APPLY_ID
    FROM T_PJ_Bond_Info t1;

    FOR rec IN (
        SELECT col_name AS name
        FROM pg_tables t
                 JOIN pg_class c ON t.tablename = c.relname
                 JOIN pg_attribute a ON a.attrelid = c.oid
                 JOIN pg_type typ ON a.atttypid = typ.oid
        WHERE t.tablename = 't_pj_bond_info_all'
          AND a.attname LIKE 'def%'
          AND a.attnum > 0
        ORDER BY a.attnum
    ) LOOP
        EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'UPDATE t_pj_bond_info_all a SET a.' || rec.name || ' = b.f_val ' ||
                          'FROM tmp_bond_info_all_20020 b ' ||
                          'WHERE a.id = b.id AND b.def_id = ' || REPLACE(rec.name, 'def_', '');

        EXECUTE IMMEDIATE 'UPDATE t_pj_bond_info_all a SET a.' || rec.name || ' = b.f_val ' ||
                          'FROM tmp_bond_info_all_20010 b ' ||
                          'WHERE a.id = b.id AND a.' || rec.name || ' IS NULL AND b.def_id = ' || REPLACE(rec.name, 'def_', '');
    END LOOP;
END;

Source SQL:
DELIMITER $$ CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE "SP_KSH_PERSON_DESC" (V_USER_ID IN VARCHAR2, OUTCURSOR OUT SYS_REFCURSOR) IS BEGIN OPEN OUTCURSOR FOR SELECT SYS_GUID() AS UUID, v0.usr_name AS user_name, v0.dept_name, v0.position_describe AS post_name, NVL(v1.ves_cnt,0) AS ves_cnt, NVL(v1.jw_num,0) AS jw_num, NVL(v1.hw_num,0) AS hw_num FROM (SELECT su.usr_id, su.usr_name, so.office_name || so2.office_name AS dept_name, su.position_describe FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON su.department_id = so.office_id LEFT JOIN sys_office so2 ON su.dept = so2.office_code WHERE su.usr_id = V_USER_ID) v0 LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(um.vessel_code) AS ves_cnt, COUNT(DISTINCT fn_get_vessel_manager_bc(um.VESSEL_CODE, SYSDATE, '1')) AS jw_num, COUNT(DISTINCT fn_get_vessel_manager_bc(um.VESSEL_CODE, SYSDATE, '2')) AS hw_num FROM ksh_user_manage_ship um WHERE um.user_id = V_USER_ID) v1 ON 1=1; END SP_KSH_PERSON_DESC; $$

Translated SQL (Postgresql-9.2):

model_answers.model_answer:
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION SP_KSH_PERSON_DESC(V_USER_ID VARCHAR) RETURNS REFCURSOR AS $$
DECLARE
    OUTCURSOR REFCURSOR;
BEGIN
    OPEN OUTCURSOR FOR
    SELECT gen_random_uuid() AS UUID,
           v0.usr_name AS user_name,
           v0.dept_name,
           v0.position_describe AS post_name,
           COALESCE(v1.ves_cnt, 0) AS ves_cnt,
           COALESCE(v1.jw_num, 0) AS jw_num,
           COALESCE(v1.hw_num, 0) AS hw_num
    FROM (
        SELECT su.usr_id,
               su.usr_name,
               so.office_name || so2.office_name AS dept_name,
               su.position_describe
        FROM sys_user su
        LEFT JOIN sys_office so ON su.department_id = so.office_id
        LEFT JOIN sys_office so2 ON su.dept = so2.office_code
        WHERE su.usr_id = V_USER_ID
    ) v0
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT COUNT(um.vessel_code) AS ves_cnt,
               COUNT(DISTINCT fn_get_vessel_manager_bc(um.VESSEL_CODE, CURRENT_DATE, '1')) AS jw_num,
               COUNT(DISTINCT fn_get_vessel_manager_bc(um.VESSEL_CODE, CURRENT_DATE, '2')) AS hw_num
        FROM ksh_user_manage_ship um
        WHERE um.user_id = V_USER_ID
    ) v1 ON TRUE;
    RETURN OUTCURSOR;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
